bcbioSingleCell

Sanitize Markers Output

Sanitize Markers Output

sanitizeMarkers(object, markers, ...)

# S4 method for seurat,data.frame
sanitizeMarkers(object, markers)

Arguments

object

Object.
markers

Seurat::FindAllMarkers() return.
...

Additional arguments (for the S4 generic definition).

Value

grouped_df, grouped by cluster ident.

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "seurat.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))
load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "seuratAllMarkersOriginal.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# seurat
sanitizeMarkers(
    seurat,
    markers = seuratAllMarkersOriginal) %>%
    glimpse()
